backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder for backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all major frontend files for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base and custom OKLCH theme variables defining light/dark color systems and utilities.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point with SEO metadata, fonts, and root element for mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling intro overlay logic, theme provider setup, and rendering the marketing page.
frontend/src/components/marketing/AboutS: Animated About section describing company history, values, and key statistics using intersection-based reveals.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Contact section with animated reveal, phone buttons, email, and social links inside styled cards.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Footer: Footer displaying branding, copyright, heritage messaging, and a Caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Galler: Displays a scroll-animated gallery grid with clickable images that open in a dialog for full-size viewing.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Header: Implements a responsive header with smooth-scroll navigation and a mobile slide-out menu.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HeroSe: Renders the landing hero with animated imagery, headline text, and scroll-triggering CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/marketing/IntroH: Provides a dialog overlay with a helper avatar and quick-action buttons for navigating to key sections.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Shows an animated grid of service cards highlighting various signage offerings.
frontend/src/components/marketing/WhyCho: Displays a feature grid explaining the company's strengths with icons and scroll-triggered animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, recreating it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status management using AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for a metallic premium theme plus utility classes and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/MarketingLanding.tsx: Composes the marketing landing page by assembling navigation, multiple content sections, and a footer.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, shadows, fonts, animations, and plugins using the project's CSS variables.
project_state.json: Describes the projectâ€™s purpose, design requirements, image assets, and implemented features for a premium 3D marketing site.
